plot: Woody Woodpecker is a proud speeder; a fat, slow-witted, red-nosed motorcycle cop is his outmatched nemesis.
title: The Screwdriver
plot_es: Woody Woodpecker is a proud speeder; a fat, slow-witted, red-nosed motorcycle cop is his outmatched nemesis.
plot_en: Woody Woodpecker is a proud speeder; a fat, slow-witted, red-nosed motorcycle cop is his outmatched nemesis.
